description:
Second release of E3SM v1.1

This update to v1.1.0 includes additional output variables and small changes to the
ECA configurations. In particular, the following changes/additions are included:

ELM:  add new diagnostic variables, Add diagnostic CNP flux from plant to CWD,
Update land use case file for CBGC 20TR compsets, Update the constant CO2
override value to be CMIP6-compliant

all:  fix bug preventing reading of v1.0 restarts,  update BGC compset names in tests,
add short names for ECA compsets with ocean BGC off, Change the names of PI control
cases to use the string "CNTL", Fix 20th-century transient BGC use case specification

This tag is used for the E3SM v1 BGC simulations using the ECA biogeochemistry configuration.
name: Energy Exascale Earth System Model v1.1.1
